title: Nami Chroma Skin Doesnt Work in Teambuilder
body: Leona's Chroma skin works well in Teambuilder but Nami's doesn't. SInce I support, I always go for Teambuilder, easier and quickier. But when I want to play Nami with her Chroma skin, I'll have to go to Blind Pick, since that's skin only works there...Hopefully this is soon fixed :/

replies.body: Does it still not work 2 patches later? I sure am feeling gypped with this Chroma thing.
I don't think so due to my Nasus chroma skin not working on Team Builder. I select the green chroma skin but always end up with the light blue color skin.

Hey Shiameyu,

Thanks for the report! We're currently investigating an issue where chromas sometimes do not register in champion select. 

Are the chroma swatches displaying in champion select? 

Did you have a chroma selected from the game prior? I main Nami, and I often use the chroma pack. I always re-select the chroma I'd like to use, and so far, I haven't had issues with it.  (Not an ideal scenario, which is why we're looking into the root cause of the issue.)

Hey KateyKhaos! 

Thank you so much for investigating that bug.

The chroma swatches (do you mean the little colored squares?) are displayed. Before, I didn't have any of the Nami's Chroma Skin in game, when I selected one in Teambuilder. Now, I can only have the "smoky" one, even though I wanted to play with the purple one. I tried to reselect the skins, switching between Spirit River and the default one, to try to reset the whole thing, but it doesn't seem to work...And it gets annoyingly complicated.

(btw, are the Chroma Packs limited skins? I can't seem to find any in the store)

Yeah, the chroma swatches where you can select the different colors. Chroma packs currently aren't limited, so they should all be available in the store. 

Thanks for the additional information - we're still working to fix this issue, so steps like you've mentioned above are wicked helpful.
I just had a game with Nami in TB, now the Chroma Skin seems to work o_O I really hope it does. I never bother going in Blind Pick when I supp....
